body.name: Beyond Laundry Detergent Strips [32 strips] - Free & Clear - Eco-friendly, Hypoallergenic. Travel friendly. Dissolvable Strips.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 44 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: EASY TO USE: Easy dose sheets eliminate laundry room messes. They work well in all washing machines, including HE, hot or cold water. Add required strip(s) to the washer before adding clothes (1 strip for small-medium loads, 2 strips for medium-large loads). Place clothes in washer. Start your preferred wash cycle. They’re great for traveling, apartment living, dorm rooms, hand washing, or everyday laundry doing
ECO-FRIENDLY: USDA Certified Biobased Content. No water means less energy used in transportation. Septic safe
SAFE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Hypoallergenic and made with your sensitive skin in mind! They are free from chlorine bleach, added dyes and contain no optical brighteners

Available in Fresh Linen & Fragrance Free. Click on the Beyond store link above to learn about our eco-friendly Dishwasher Tablets and Dryer Sheets! We update our package from time to time, so there may be a difference from what you receive and the images you see here. Not to worry, it’s the same great product inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific for streamlining laundry, whether traveling or staying close to home
reviews.reviewText: Purchased originally for multi-day family travel, I am so satisfied by the effectiveness for cleaning clothes while not taking up space (or adding weight) to burden someone’s suitcase. I have started using them at home (after using up the unnecessarily large detergent jug) and am happy to free up space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Impressed and Pleased
reviews.reviewText: I had never used any laundry soap like this but hated the plastic waste with the big jugs. When I first used it it, I was dubious that the little strips would work but let me tell you they do! I didn't realize I was wasting a lot of detergent and using so much more than I have to now. I do not like any scent and as a single guy, wondered if this little strip would clean good enough not leave any smell without the use of fragrance to cover. It does, it works wonderfully. The ONLY MINOR downside is, it is not quite as good on certain stains, mostly food types, almost though. But these were quickly dispatched by a small spray of pre-treatment and from then on, no problems. The upsides far out weigh this one minor issue, the space saving, the ease of use, the elimination of the big plastic jugs. I am a happy convert!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Low waste, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This detergent seems to get my clothes clean just as well as the big name brands. There's no plastic waste, no weird brighteners and no scent (I got the unscented). What more can I say?I'm still working out when to use one strip and when to use two. One strip seems to work even for big loads so long as the clothes aren't very dirty or greasy. I haven't taken the chance on a single strip for a really dirty load, but I suspect that would be fine as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A friend at work introduced me to this product. I gave a package to each of my kids for Christmas. I love that I can pack it for vacation. I like that you can use as much or as little as you need per load. I love that it cleans and doesn't take up shelf space in my tiny linen closet. There really isn't anything I dislike about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for a trip as my son has sensitive skin and I didn't want to worry about finding free and clear detergent.We used these for the whole family's laundry and they worked great. When I got home I continued to use them and now I will repurchase. I love how they save space and I don't have to deal with the liquid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Big fan of not having a big jug of detergent taking up valuable space, big fan of not risking spilling or adding more product than intending, big fan of not having to carry jugs upstairs. Free+clear products are also a must for me and these are very gentle and non-irritating on clothes and bedding. (I'm giving 5 stars on scent due to as-advertised LACK of fragrance and no chemical smell).I'm not sure that this would as effective as liquid detergent at getting out serious odors or cleaning extremely soiled items, but for everyday use it does well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well, but some white, spots of residue left on clothes.
reviews.reviewText: Cleans just fine. Residue spots left on some clothing, so not dissolving completely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, nypo-allergenic and saves space
reviews.reviewText: Leaves clothing clean, and doesn't leave us feeling itchy. So easy to use and takes up much less space on the laundry shelf than those huge, heavy plastic bottles.
